ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Militia
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: The kingdom in which [PAWN_nameDef] lived was being devastated by hordes of barbarians. Everything got to the point that the lord was forced to convene a militia from very young peasants.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Squire servant
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once falls into citizenship to a detachment of knights who stole {PAWN_gender ? him : her} and several other people from the village. The squire {PAWN_gender ? he : she} is attached to teaches [PAWN_nameDef] some swordsmanship out of boredom.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Lord pupil
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: It so happened that [PAWN_nameDef] falls under the auspices of a petty lord and learns some techniques in training fights.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Forest archer
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lives for some time in a forest village, where {PAWN_gender ? he : she} learns to use a bow and goes hunting.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Young squire
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered to go to war with a group of knights. It didn't last long, but [PAWN_nameDef] is gaining valuable experience.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Desperate child
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] witnesses the devastation of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} village by the nomads. In despair, {PAWN_gender ? he : she} takes up arms and rushes at the enemy from behind.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Aristocrat child
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] becomes the adopted son of a wealthy aristocrat. {PAWN_gender ? He : She} is not interested in court life, so [PAWN_nameDef] spends a long time with the knights of the castle.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Young robber
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was not a quiet kid and was running around the village looking for adventure and a good fight.
